content: रजत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [रंज् अतच् नलोपः <ls>Uṇ. 3. 111</ls>] {@--1@} Silvery, made of silver. {@--2@} Whitish. --तं {@--1@} Silver; शुक्तौ रजतमिदमिति ज्ञानं भ्रमः; <ls>Ki. 5. 41</ls>; <ls>N. 22. 52.</ls> {@--2@} Gold. {@--3@} A pearl-ornament or necklace. {@--4@} Blood. {@--5@} Ivory. {@--6@} An asterism, a constellation. {@--7@} A mountain.
